column5: AQMS past performance is not indicative of future performance with Veolia now onboard I think 16 mods YE is in everybodys best interest Massive hiring spree and recent PR saying on track
AQMS put a fork in the buyers they act done
VUZI nice run this week AQMS will be my next big winner
AQMS maybe today maybe next month we will wish we bought more at this 155159 level
AQMS take your loss and rebuy in a month for tax harvesting No movement means at least u make something back
AQMS we better hope that 147 holds up
AQMS to feel disgust is to say little but thank you mngmt because I have been short
AQMS Dear Management Board Buy shares already While youre at it how about an open letter to your shareholders Now that its been a year since youve taken over what do you have to show for it

AQMS Veolia is smart They put there employees on the site for training Incase this works out So when they decide to build a plant they can operate it themselves If it doesnt they can get rid of the employees You cant get rid of a plant once its built unless you take a huge loss

AQMS maybe the location timing will be extended I dont know but this is bad Really bad I am down 50 I am afraid to buy more since I have 25000 invested If management keeps acting like this i am going to pull my money out when I break even Any news on management buying more shares If there profit comes from shares you think they would be buying at this price Someone please educate me I cant rap my mind around it They will probably wait until the last day of June to make an announcement I would assume
AQMS classic example of bad management from CEO to IR
AQMS 87M market cap ridiculous How does this not get snatched up by someone
AQMS we soooo deep at the bottom that next time we get news it wont prob make it to 2yikes imo
AQMS Getting silly Management board needs to step up and buy some shares
